sourcing.instructions: Mercury: Obtain from licensed chemical suppliers or specialized metal suppliers.
steps: Mercury: Obtain from licensed chemical suppliers or specialized metal suppliers.
1. In a well-ventilated area, put on appropriate personal protective equipment (gloves, goggles, mask).
preparation.raw_text: 1. In a well-ventilated area, put on appropriate personal protective equipment (gloves, goggles, mask).

steps: 1. Preheat a furnace or high-temperature oven to 1000 째C (1832 째F).
heating.raw_text: 1. Preheat a furnace or high-temperature oven to 1000 째C (1832 째F).

steps: 1. After 4 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After 4 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature.

steps: 1. Allow the material to sit at room temperature for an additional 2 hours.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Allow the material to sit at room temperature for an additional 2 hours.
